title: Job (Beta)
description:
The beta_job block lets you define recurring requests or sequences with an given interval. The job runs at startup
and for every interval and has an own log type: job which represents the starting point with an uid for tracing
purposes.

title: JWT
description:
The jwt block lets you configure JSON Web Token access control for your gateway.
Like all access control types, the jwt block is defined in
the definitions Block and can be referenced in all configuration blocks by its
required label.
